error.ask_to_send_error: An error occurred. Please help us fixing it by allowing to send the details to us. This option is also available in the settings. Thanks!

main.security_info: If the person you see here confirms to see the same ID, you are securely connected:

settings.bandwidth_info: Experimental: With this setting Briefing tries to reduce bandwith by thinning video and audio data.
settings.blur_info: Experimental: A smart artifical intelligence algorithm is able to indetify the shapes of persons and will blur out the remaining background. This adds some visual privacy to your call. But attention, this is a very power consuming feature and will very likely not work on mobile devices!
settings.fill_info: Briefing tries to use up the available screen space as much as possible by scaling up the video in a way that makes it fit in its visual frame. When turned off you will see the whole video instead but with borders around it.
settings.image_tip: You can upload your own background by dragging an image file on this window.
settings.random_image: Click to get another random image.
settings.sentry_confirm: Thanks for allowing bug tracking. Please confirm to reload the page now.
settings.sentry_info: When encounting a programming error or other relevant information that is useful improving the app, we will send debug data to a service called sentry.io.
settings.subscribe_info: Experimental: By subscribing you will receive a notification when somebody else enters this room. You can then join the conversation with one click. Notifications will only be shown if the browser is running.
settings.title: Settings

share.link_info: Please share this link with everyone you want to invite to this session:
share.message: Invite by sending the link via pressing on the {symbol} symbol.
share.qr_info: You can also scan this QR Code with a mobile device camera:
share.title: Invite
